sections.name: BATTLE TITAN FORMATIONS / / Army must contain at least one Chaos Emperor Titan or Chaos Warlord Titan / / Army may not Mix Nurgle/Tzeench or Slaanesh/Khorne formations
SCOUT TITAN FORMATIONS / / Two for each Battle Titan formation. Army may not Mix Nurgle/Tzeench or Slaanesh/Khorne formations
DAEMON ENGINE FORMATIONS / / One for each Battle Titan or Scout Titan formation. Army may not Mix Nurgle/Tzeench or Slaanesh/Khorne formations
HELL-FORGE & CHAOS NAVY ALLIES / / Max 33% of the army
